creditline: Given in memory of Byron H. and Doreen R. McKinney and in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: celadon green glaze; small ring foot; rounded form with rounded shoulder; ring mouth; four decorative relief Foo dog heads with rings in their mouths (attached to vessel) around shoulder
inscription:
Inscription

on underside, in blue:  six-character Chinese inscription
title: Jar
